name: Albula Pass
description:
The quietest of the three passes into the Engadin valley - the Albula is known for its UNESCO World Heritage landscape.

name: Col de l'Iseran
description: Col de l'Iseran at 2764 metres in altitude at its summit is a mountain pass in France and the highest paved pass in the Alps. Located in the department of the Savoie the road is part of the Route des Grandes Alpes.
